title: Twisted League/Tasks

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the Twisted League. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn league points and unlock relics that buff their character. Tasks span five difficulty levels - Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite, and Master.

content:
This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the Twisted League. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn league points and unlock relics that buff their character. Tasks span five difficulty levels - Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite, and Master.

Across all difficulty levels, there are a total of 495 tasks to complete, with 91080 points available in total.

Maxing the player's skills awards a cumulative total of 12,490 points.

Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite
  • 5 Master

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 88 tasks available, there are a total of 880 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.
